live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50407.summary: Some customers in the Current River area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50407.title: Jun 8 - Thunder Bay (Current River) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
